Analyzing OpenAPI spec for /delete_essence_msg endpoint. Request body requires 'message_id' (int or string). Response body requires nested structure: top-level (status, retcode, data, message, wording, echo), data (errCode, errMsg, result), result (wording, digestUin, digestTime, msg), msg (groupCode, msgSeq, etc. based on example). Refactoring code to use Pydantic v2, nested models, Literal type for 'status', '| None' for nullable fields, and adding Field descriptions. Removing unused imports.
